name: Keep the CTRL
description:
Survive endless wave of foe by dashing and shooting your way through them.

Be wary, each time you'll be hit one of your control will be locked. But slain foes can drop some CTRL to save you !

Controls (pun intended ?):

WASD: Moving 

Left Click: Shoot

Right Click: Dash

This game is a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Any resemblance to actual unity primitve, living or dead,  is purely coincidental.
